projects.name: Milo
projects.description: Milo is a mobile application that helps users to find the best coffee shops in their area. Users can also rate and review the coffee shops they visit.
tasks: Developed the front-end of the application using React Native
Integrated Firebase for user authentication and data storage
Implemented the rating and review system

projects.name: Educate
projects.description: Educa is a web application that helps students to find the best tutors in their area. Tutors can create profiles and list their services on the platform.
tasks: Developed the front-end of the application using React
Implemented the tutor profile creation and listing system
